A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As an artist\, aspiring filmmaker and ex-physics student I can tell you that this is a terrible movie in every regard and an even worse star wars movie. Such incoherent\,incompetent and uninspired writing and woefully bad editing/pacing. I'm truly baffled about how anyone capable of logic and any shred of film-knowledge could come to any other conclusion. Because the movie is logically inconsistent and incoherent to the highest degree. I'd be confident enough that I could prove it on a chalkboard - it's that blatantly obvious and NOT at all an issue of taste or fandom. Shame on every professional critic who gave this a positive review - you don't deserve to be a published critic of cinema and you're a disgrace to your profession. I signed up to this site to give this the review it deserves and because I'm supremely confident that given a debate I could best any critic on this\, anywhere\, anytime. Please don't watch it
